import React,{Component} from 'react' import './LoginSignUp.css' class LoginSignUp extends Component{ signupHandler=()=>{ const container = document.getElementById('container'); container.classList.add("right-panel-active"); } signinHandler=()=>{ const container = document.getElementById('container'); signInButton.addEventListener('click', () => { container.classList.remove("right-panel-active"); }); } render(){ return(

 ) } } export default LoginSignUp
